pageTitle: Tbags Los Angeles Strapless Mini Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 22in / 56cm, from center back MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Dry clean. 94% nylon/6% spandex. Fabric: Textured slinky jersey. A classic-cool leopard-print mini dress with a refined herringbone texture. Gathered elastic banding cinches the top hem, while a smocked panel defines the waist. Slant pockets sit at the hips, and the pleated skirt follows the hips for an alluring silhouette. Double-layered. Sheer. Description Sale > Tbags Los Angeles > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Launched in 2001 as a handbag line, Tbags Los Angeles quickly gained ground, selling its pieces to upscale boutiques and department stores. Under the creative eye of designer Shadi Askari-Farhat the label has grown into a complete ready-to-wear collection, known for its signature prints and bohemian charm. The sexy, sophisticated style of Tbags Los Angeles dresses and tops has earned the label a devoted celebrity following.
